info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:45PM MDT until June 24 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JONES AND WEST CENTRAL LYMAN COUNTIES... At 444 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Westover, or 14 miles southeast of Murdo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 428pm, quarter sized hail was reported 16 miles northeast of white river. The storm has since strengthened. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vivian. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
